full_summary:
================================
### Request for Proposal: Senior GIS Resources

**Tender Reference:** PW-23-01022514  
**Number of Amendments:** 1  
**Solicitation Number:** 2023-00966  
**Publication Date:** January 23, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** March 6, 2023, at 14:00:00  
**Status:** Expired

### Scope of Work

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the services of Senior Geographic Information System (GIS) resources to support the CADIA project. The procurement has been conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

The selected bidder will provide:

* A Level 3 GIS Applications Analyst  
* A Level 3 GIS Application Architect

The project team will leverage existing CFIA infrastructure to develop solutions for the CADIA project, using platforms such as ArcGIS, Dynamics 365 (D-365), and Abode Experience Manager.

### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible, bidders must:

* Certify as Indigenous businesses under PSIB  
* Comply with all requirements of PSIB  
* Possess Tier 1 qualification for services in the National Capital Region for the specified category(ies)

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)  
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement  
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)  
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)  
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)  
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Alexander Lisowski  
Email: alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca  
Phone: Not available  
Fax: Not available

### Documentation and Attachments

The tender notice and supporting documentation are available in English and French on the CanadaBuys website:

* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/23/4225ed486b
